attributes.action: Build a statue of Alan Turing in Parliament Square.
attributes.background: Alan Turing helped bring World War II to an end, pioneered computer science and predicted the potential of artificial intelligence. He's a true British hero yet was prosecuted for being gay. It's time to pay our collective respect and tribute to his work and life with a statue in Parliament Square.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the granting of planning permission in Parliament Square is a matter for Westminster City Council and not the UK Government or Parliament.
